about_the_game:
The official soundtrack from Slender: The Arrival, the terrifying survival horror game from Blue Isle Studios. Composed and arranged by Mark J Hadley and directed by Brenden Frank, this soundtrack DLC contains all of the game music in 320kbps MP3 format.

01 - Slender (2:06) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
02 - Ponder (0:29) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
03 - No Friends (2:36) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
04 - Tainted (0:48) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
05 - Shadowed (2:24) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
06 - Distance (1:00) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
07 - Conceal (2:00) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
08 - Isolate (2:45) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
09 - Suspended (1:21) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
10 - Constricted (1:06) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
11 - Within Sight (1:44) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
12 - Flicker (2:24) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
13 - Corrupted (0:56) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
14 - Responsible (2:00) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
15 - Sealed Fate *NEW* (3:02) - Composed by Mark J Hadley and Brenden Frank
16 - Willow *NEW* (1:21) - Arranged and performed by Brenden Frank
detailed_description:
The official soundtrack from Slender: The Arrival, the terrifying survival horror game from Blue Isle Studios. Composed and arranged by Mark J Hadley and directed by Brenden Frank, this soundtrack DLC contains all of the game music in 320kbps MP3 format.

01 - Slender (2:06) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
02 - Ponder (0:29) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
03 - No Friends (2:36) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
04 - Tainted (0:48) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
05 - Shadowed (2:24) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
06 - Distance (1:00) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
07 - Conceal (2:00) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
08 - Isolate (2:45) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
09 - Suspended (1:21) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
10 - Constricted (1:06) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
11 - Within Sight (1:44) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
12 - Flicker (2:24) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
13 - Corrupted (0:56) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
14 - Responsible (2:00) - Composed by Mark J Hadley
15 - Sealed Fate *NEW* (3:02) - Composed by Mark J Hadley and Brenden Frank
16 - Willow *NEW* (1:21) - Arranged and performed by Brenden Frank
legal_notice: © 2013 Blue Isle Studios Inc. All Rights Reserved. Based upon the character Slender Man created by Eric "Victor Surge" Knudsen.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04.1 LTS
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04.1 LTS
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 70 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Intel Mac, OS X version Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later.
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Intel Mac, OS X version Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later.
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
